mapper.select: SELECT u.userNum, u.fcmToken FROM sellerdetail sd JOIN product p ON sd.sellerNum = p.sellerNum JOIN user u ON sd.userNum = u.userNum WHERE sd.isAlarm = 1 AND p.cateNum = #{cateNum} AND p.status = 1 AND u.fcmToken IS NOT NULL GROUP BY u.userNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm (reNum, seNum, content1, content2, type, targetNum) VALUES (#{reNum}, #{seNum}, #{content1}, #{content2}, #{type}, #{targetNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alarm WHERE seNum=#{seNum} ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 5
